Self-Sacrificing Strike.name: Self-Sacrificing Strike
Self-Sacrificing Strike.flavor: You dive to your friend’s rescue and then rise up in revenge.
Self-Sacrificing Strike.trigger: An ally within 6 squares of you is the target of a ranged or melee attack.
Self-Sacrificing Strike.effect: You shift up to 5 squares to end adjacent to the triggering ally, slide the ally 1 square, and shift into the square the ally left. You make the following attack.
Self-Sacrificing Strike.target: The creature that made the triggering attack
Self-Sacrificing Strike.onHit: 3[W] + ability modifier damage, and you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses against the triggering attack.
Self-Sacrificing Strike.aftereffect: You become the target of the triggering attack.

Inspiring Example.name: Inspiring Example
Inspiring Example.flavor: You’re not giving up, and your fortitude renews your friends’ hope.
Inspiring Example.effect: Make a saving throw against an effect a save can end. If you succeed, allies you can see can make a saving throw as a free action against any single effect that a save can end.

Vicious Guardian.name: Vicious Guardian
Vicious Guardian.flavor: You strike a vicious blow against your foe to let it know that you are the only enemy worth facing.
Vicious Guardian.onHit: 4[W] + ability modifier damage, and the target is marked (save ends). While the target is marked by you, you can make a basic attack against the target as a free action each time it makes an attack that does not include you.
Vicious Guardian.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is marked by you until the end of its next turn.
